title: Proceeding by minor parent
context: ยง576B-302 Proceeding by minor parent. A minor parent, or a guardian or other legal representative of a minor parent, may maintain a proceeding on behalf of or for the benefit of the minor&rsquo;s child. [L 1997, c 295, pt of ยง1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of ยง1]
